featured.text: With more than 13 million children already driven from classrooms by conflict, it is no exaggeration to say that the educational prospects of a generation of children are in the balance.

definition.zh_def: 誇張，指對事物的描述超出實際情況的程度。
definition.en_def: A statement that represents something as better or worse than it really is; an overstatement.
definition.example: His claim that he ran a marathon in under two hours was an exaggeration.
